detectors.description:
allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#16)
	- Clock.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#109-111)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Clock.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#94-98)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#18)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#19)
	- Clock.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#141-143)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#21)
	- Clock.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#90-92)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#22)
	- Clock.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Clock.sol#119-139)
